title: I'm a new customer so ensure is alright…
text: I'm a new customer so ensure is alright so far.

title: Enjoyable initially had trouble getting through…
text: I initially had trouble getting through to a representative due to dropped call. I called back and was told that the young lady who I first spoke with would call me back. I didn't recieve a call back. I tried the 1- 855 phone number again and ended up speaking with Shuron Sloan. She went above and beyond! She was very pleasant and made the whole medicare enrollment experience bearable,and enjoyable!

title: The agent was great.(Suheil Butler) …
text: The agent was great.(Suheil Butler)  Some issues with two dropped calls, not her fault.  Was given a call back number but it would not reconnect us.  Next day had a message from a different person (Donna) and given an extension to get through to that person but when I dialed the number I wasn’t given a prompt to press the extension.A lot of info, and lengthy signup but hoping this insurance is as good as it sounds!

title: Kenny was exceptional
text: Kenny was extremely helpful and thoughtful and professional.Presentation way too long how many seniors actually follow this and understand all the different things covered at what point does one stop listening and just say yes/no to get to the end of all the legal stuff that probably is geared toward the insurer

title: Thank You!
text: Thank You!! I Would Like For You To Send Me More Info And Books!! As Well As Keep Me Informed And Direct On Each Material And Matter!! I'm Looking For A Partner To Help Me Build And Rebuild Beautiful And Heinous Work. Items From A Tech Job I Have From School And From Working The Field Has Put Me Into Position To Make Some Very Important Moves For Myself As Well As For My Family!! I Would Also Like To Add Incentives Into The Equation. My Number Is 2315319791 If You Could Give Me A Call And Send Me Some Emails And More Packages On The Job It Would Be Highly Appreciated!! Thank You!!

title: I recently visited this company and I…
text: I recently visited this company and I want to write a review about Ensurem.I was consulted by a wonderful manager who explained everything calmly and clearly. I had a lot of questions, especially about insurance coverage. But I got answers to these questions. And I really liked the first consultation at Ensurem , I learned a lot of useful information and decided to take out insurance here, it seems to me that I made the right choice.

title: Your Professional Employee Mr.Dontay…
text: Your Professional Employee Mr.Dontay ..What a pleasure it was..I've been stressing going into retirement  kinda 😬 but I was able too do what I've been trying too do for 5months being undecided. Really overwhelmed by it all.Mr.D sesled the deal in about 30 mins.thxs you

title: Dewayne Pauley the agent I talked to…
text: Dewayne Pauley the agent I talked to was very helpful in enrolling me into Medicaid program thru a different Humana Gold Plus D SNP H5619-136 program. I’m hoping that the benefits are as described. I’m looking forward to March 1when my new coverage begins

title: Heather
text: My call was inquiring about changing and the customer service Heather went thru all my meds and doctors. She checked for me to have the better plan .I appreciate it when people give good service to try and help and not just give basic information! I’m waiting for my packet to come by mail still

title: The agent that I dealt with was very professional and caring.
text: The agent that I dealt with was very very knowligable and extremely helpful.  She was very professional and helped me all the way through.  Looked up doctors, compared differences in my current plan. Even a few days later when I was concerned about a particular medication I was about to begin, I phoned her and she helped to aley my concerns.  Very glad I have her to rely on.  Thank you Yvonne Henderson for all your help and assistance.

title: My experience was very good
text: My experience was very good. Sharon was a pleasure to talk to and she answered all my questions. I was a little surprised by the length of our conversation, but we did get the procedure finished. All in all it was a pleasant experience.

title: I was diagnosed with Breast Cancer last…
text: I was diagnosed with Breast Cancer last week. My existing insurance wasn't going to cover my Chemotherapy or my surgery.  I was able to get a new plan with a new company that is happy to cover the treatments!   The agent made it easier to understand the coverage.Jonathan was friendly and thorough. Thank you 😁

title: All the extra bentifits that i was not…
text: All the extra bentifits that i was not getting with my old company also the agent explained all my options. The best thing i liked is the ur card i can use for food with the cost in this day and time this is a blessing. I was really surprised with the dentle coverage where i can get extractions, Great! I feel i made a very wise choice. Thank you for the information you provided, the agent was very friendly and explained the plan all the way thru. Thanks again, Randy Jackson Ft Myers Fl.

title: Ryan Morse(not sure of spelling) was…
text: Ryan Morse(not sure of spelling) was very thorough and took time to explain the coverage.  I felt comfortable asking questions.

title: Health care insurance
text: My experience with Mr. Roman was good. He was very helpful and patient. He would explain things that I didn’t quite understand and made it clear. He did explained in detail the choices available and allowed me to make a decision based on the information and questions to my satisfaction.

title: Informed and intelligent agent
text: This was my first experience with enrolling in a Medicare part C plan and the agent that I had Nicole was very pleasant, she was patient as I asked many questions and she helped ma to pick out the plan that best fit me

title: Intake Review
text: The representative took the time to explain and search the policy that would meet  my needs. She also gave me her number and extension, in case I had some follow-up questions. Most of all she was very professional.

title: Everyone has been very helpful.
text: Everyone has been very helpful  in explaining  what I need and telling about the difference between programs that I can pick from. Everyone has been nice and polite. It's nice to know that I can call people  if I have questions about anything.

title: As far as I heard the different stages…
text: As far as I heard the different stages of the plans I'm 3/4 of the way there in the confidence of the subsidiaries but time will tell in the results. The Agent was very helpful of giving me info that I didn't quite understand.

title: It was a long procedure
text: It was a long procedure.  I wasn't  aware of the  time needed to complete  it. The pe person helping me needed up to date equipment.  He was very polite and professional.  Answered question that I had, but just a long process!

title: My agent Liz was amazing
text: My agent Liz was very patient, answered all my questions and explained all my benefits. The only thing i didn't like was she did tell me i would receive a call and that i would just have to answer a few more questions which i did, but after that i kept receiving calls for the same questions and i got upset and asked why they keep calling to ask the same questions i already answered than if finally stopped.

title: The initial presentation was good
text: The initial presentation was good. The information shared was very on point and personal. It was very well explained and questions were answered and understood. I hope this will be a very positive decision and helpful for me.

title: To have all the information
text: I am very happy with my agent on how he took the time to research for the best possible plan for my needs. He also took the time to explain everything to me so that I understood everything and answered all my questions. He also found a doctor who was taking new patients in my area. Thank you very much

title: My experience was very informative I…
text: My experience was very informative I was satisfied with the plan explained to me. The  agent was knowledgeable of what he was doing and answered the questions I was concerned about,

title: Enrollment
text: I had a good experience although very long.  I understand need for disclosures but many voiced didn’t apply to me.  Kim Kennedy

title: Mr. Kevin Thorp
text: Mr. Kevin Thorp is always a jewel to speak to. He goes above and beyond to find me the best insurance for my needs.

title: Franklin was a great help a big old…
text: Franklin was a great help a big old help he explained everything he gave me a feedback number to get back in touch with him just so helpful

title: She was very helpful
text: She was very helpful. Wasn't pushy about what coverage to get. Very polite, listened to me about what I  wanted. She joked around some with me, asked about my family.  Lin Musa was very knowledgeable about the plans

title: I have not received any information since the I talked to Robert LeClair
text: My experience has not been great.  I have not received any more correspondence since the initial call from Robert LeClair

title: Elisabeth was very good with her…
text: Elisabeth was very good with her knowledge of insurance and what was available in my state. Thank Elisabeth for taking such good care of me.

title: I find the company to be awesome  the…
text: I find the company to be awesome  the first agent  was very pleasant and answer every question iask took time to help me to understand when I didn't  I truly enjoyed  all the help thank you very much

title: I spoke with a gentlemen by the name of…Lance
text: I spoke with a gentlemen by the name of Lance. He was very helpful. I have a hearing problem with aides in both ears. I was able to understand with him with no problem. He is very nice and helped me understand the different options.

title: Excellent Service
text: Ahmed took the time to explain the plan in detail. Excellent communication and customer service. Agent was very knowledgeable and answered any question that I had.

title: Making decisions?
text: Phillip was very patient and answered all my questions until I understood. Pointed out the advantages of each plan and let me decide on a plan.

title: What people need in health care
text: The customer service was very helpful. Mr. FRY helped me a lot. Was patient and getting all my information.

title: Crystal  Woodget gave me a good sercvice
text: I really had a good service from Crystal Woodget..She was very professional in giving me all the information that I need for my health insurance

title: The agent I spoke with made sure that I…
text: The agent I spoke with made sure that I understood everything that we talked about and asked if I had any questions,he was pleasant to talk to.

title: A Lasting Expression
text: The entire experience was very professional and fulfilling. All our questions were answered and explained. We gained so very much even over the phone line.

title: Myra was the representative I spoke…
text: Myra was the representative I spoke with and she did an amazing job in explaining my benefits as well as my options are. I can't say enough good about her.

title: The rep was courteous and polite
text: The rep was courteous and polite. He offered me what I was looking for and more. Took time and explain  as much  continue as possible about the health plan .

title: Good customer service knowledgeable…
text: Good customer service knowledgeable people who are here to serve me. Get the best coverage available to me.

title: Ensure was very helpful in explaining what was changing and making sure I understood the changes in my plans he was patient and very well tempered
text: How well he made sure I understood the situation. And how well he explained how the changes were going to benefit me.

title: Professional
text: The agent was very knowledgeable very polite and respectful and got the job done

title: So far so good
text: So far so good. I can’t give you a 5 star rating because I haven’t received all my information or card yet.

text: The agent made me well informed of policy and was very polite and helpful with any questions I was concerned with

title: Definitely would be a 10++but I found…

title: That their very helpful and they explain everything very well

title: Pharmacy convenience
text: My reason for choosing your plan was to get my prescriptions closer to my house. I currently have to travel to CVS Windham ME which is 5.7 miles .There is a Walgreens 1.8 miles from my house which would be more convenient for me.

title: The representative SHARON DRNEK…
text: The representative SHARON DRNEK answered my call was extremely professional and went above and beyond to get me registered  with my New insurance made sure my pulmonologist and my PC were in the plan Sharon was very pleasant to deal with I would have given 5 stars but only allowed me to give 4 stars

title: This plan sounds good
text: The plan was explained to me carefully.However I need to get the booklet to read more about the OTC plan

title: I called regarding the $900 healthy…
text: I called regarding the $900 healthy grocery benefit, but was never told anything about it.  Did change my insurance carrier and was to have an appointment this week to go over plans for 2023. Made it sound like an in home appointment, but was another phone appointment.  My time zone was not taken in to account and was called an hour earlier than expected.  Was not told about any other plans available, so don't know what choices are out there.

title: My enrolling with Deborah was great
text: My enrolling with Deborah was great. She explained everything in detail and answered any question I had. The only reason for the 4 rating is that I have had at least 6 calls from associates to go over the same thing again and again. Sometimes it can be annoying.

title: The representative was very informative…

title: Wonderful
text: It was wonderful. So easy to enroll with the person I spoke to. He explained everything so clearly. Happy.

title: Melissa was very informative and…
text: Melissa was very informatice and patient.  Only critique, when someone is familiar with PPOs and HMOs, no need to keep explaining the difference.  I know that is what she is trained to do, but some seniors, such as myself, come from a professional background and know the difference.   She also needs stop talking so fast.  Will keep her as my agent.

title: The representative was very…
text: The representative was very knowledgeable in explaining the plan we acquired. Satisfied so far.

title: Confusing Information
text: A lot of that information is confusing especially when it comes to co-pays & deductibles. I pay nothing now so when they say things like that it makes you think you are going to have to pay something from an already strained income. Being in that position allows you to understand why people have to choose between health care & food.

title: Out of the blue
text: I’m not certain if this is the company that contacted me today. If it is, then I was pleasant surprised to talk with Andy Roman about my best options for selecting an Aetna Medicare Butler Prime HMO policy . He was very helpful and seemed to be quite knowledgeable

title: John was very informative and did an…
text: John was very informative and did an excellent job going over my plan and answering my many questions.

text: Finally got some results that were favorable.  Planning to stick with this plan and see how it goes, until next sign up period

title: Professional Services provided
text: Date of experience: May 19, 2022

title: Courtesy with questions answered,when…
text: Courtesy with questions answered,when you somewhat thinks it might ihave been a little dumb

title: I had a wonderful experience with…
text: I had a wonderful experience with Marleah, she patient and kind. She was very helpful along with explaining all the benefits. I have to really commend her wit patience because my medication was moved and she didn't seem agitated while I tried to find it. I appreciated that being as she has no idea of my situation. I did call back to find out where was my welcome letter, my insurance card,  my rewards card at. I spoke to one of her associate who told me would xall me back but she never did.

title: The agent was pleasant and spoke well
text: The agent was pleasant and spoke well. Easy to understand.

title: It was a very positive experience
text: It was a very positive experience.   No pressure and accurate information, even some non-positive facts.   I appreciated the honesty

title: I love being able to order on line and…
text: I love being able to order on line and having it delivered to my house

title: The man who helped me was great.
text: Date of experience: May 05, 2022

title: Calling Aetna direct revealed I was…
text: Calling Aetna direct revealed I was missing or did not understand the prescription portion of the plan.

title: I sent out the form formal complaint…
text: I sent out the form formal complaint and I had to be called and asked for my information and they said that they did not receive anything from me by mail and I know that I sent it out to them then it has taken nearly two months now to hear back from you

title: Had a great experience with Marliegh
text: Had a great experience with Marliegh. Was a bit confused looking things over but she helped me to understand.

title: I have used Ensurem's services multiple…
text: I have used Ensurem's services multiple times and each time they  advised the best medical insurance coverage for my needs and financial situation. The agent explained in detail what the Medicare Advantage Plan covered. It was much easier to have them do all the research for me.

title: Somethings have not turned out as…
text: Somethings have not turned out as expected. Dental coverage is not what I expected either. All in all it was good. I don't intend to change any time soon.

title: The people that I have talked to have…
text: The people that I have talked to have been very helpful

title: Tell me who's acceptable!
text: I'm still wondering WHO I can go to for coverage of medical, dental, and eye  coverage. I would love to have a catalogue with acceptable businesses listed. I've surfed online a bit, but I get horribly lost sometimes.

title: I called and the agent helped me get a…
text: I called and the agent helped me get a new advantage plan. He was very knowledgeable  and definitely  helpful. It was very much appreciated.

title: This agency is good but prepare to follow up
text: Our agent was very helpful to my getting supplemental insurance. The reason I gave it 4stars is because he did not discuss the different options that are available to retirees. I have an HMO only to realize it has certain limitations, I would have liked to know the difference between that and a PPO.By the way, the first agent I used did not complete the transaction and I had to call again and was completed by a second agent. Not a good first impression, for both myself and my sister, she applied at the same date by my recommendation and had the same issue. It was a busy time but you’re dealing with peoples’ lives and it is important to be thorough

title: Review
text: People are nice and informed.  Wading these waters if not certain is scary.  Hope you find one person to go the distance.
